name: Little Town Nightmare Demo
description:
Here is a small Demo of a horror game I made in a few hours called "Little Town Nightmares". Set in the Small College Town of Heart Hill, MN. Kam is a senior college student. She's an English major with dreams of being a screenwriter. Her world is turned upside down as she is in the center of a zombie outbreak. And when fiction becomes reality how is she going to handle it? Any ways hope you like it.

Made in RPG MAKER MV
